dublin_core.dcvalue: We have developed a knowledge based multimedia telecare system based on a multimedia PC connected by ISDN at 128 kbit s The user display is a television Multimedia material is accessed through a browser based interface A remote control handset is used as the main means of interaction to ensure ease of use and overcome any initial reservations resulting from technophobia on the part of the informal carer The system was used in 13 family homes and four professional sites in Northern Ireland The evaluations produced positive comments from the informal carers There are plans to expand the use of the system

A knowledge-based multimedia telecare system to improve the provision of formal and informal care for the elderly and disabled.
